price: Was there not a period of time when man was not a thing [even] mentioned[1]?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
